name: cesium-clipping-plane-demo
description: Standalone Cesium viewer demonstrating clipping plane issues in horizontal and depth directions

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.js *.css public node_modules dist/
scripts.build:win: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && copy *.html dist\ && copy *.js dist\ && copy *.css dist\ && xcopy public dist\public\ /E /I && xcopy node_modules dist\node_modules\ /E /I
